title: Online Sync
info_1: Data will be synced to xcpc-statement-generator/ContestTitle folder in the cloud
info_2: Includes contest config, images, version history, and all other data
info_3: Regular backups to cloud are recommended to prevent data loss
cors_warning_desc: Due to browser security policies, direct access to WebDAV services (like Nutstore) may encounter CORS errors.
solution_1: Use browser extension: Install CORS Unblock or similar (for development/testing only)
solution_2: Use local proxy: Set up a local proxy server to forward requests
solution_3: Use Tencent Cloud COS: Switch to COS storage (no CORS restrictions)
alternatives_desc: These cloud storage services have no browser CORS restrictions:
alt_cos_desc: Fast in China, free tier available, built-in support
alt_oss_desc: Similar to COS, requires manual SDK integration
alt_github_desc: Free unlimited, developer-friendly, use GitHub API
alt_cloudflare_desc: S3-compatible, generous free tier, global CDN

error.cors_error: CORS error: Cannot access WebDAV service. Please check the solutions below.
